title: Input schema for the youtube-channel-apify-actor actor
description: This actor accepts YouTube channel URLs and returns details from their corresponding 'about' pages.

keywords.title: Search Keywords
keywords.description: Provide some keywords for Youtube channel search.

limit.title: Search Results Limit
limit.description: Search results limit for each search keyword.
limit.sectionDescription: Limit the number of results from the scraper

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max Requests Per Crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of pages that the crawler will open. The crawl will stop when this limit is reached.

startUrls.title: Direct URLs
startUrls.description: Provide some direct Youtube channel urls.

requestHandlerTimeoutSecs.title: Handle Page Timeout Secs
requestHandlerTimeoutSecs.description: Timeout in which the function passed as handlePageFunction needs to finish, in seconds.

maxRequestRetries.title: Max Request Retries
maxRequestRetries.description: Indicates how many times the request is retried if BasicCrawlerOptions.handleRequestFunction fails.

minConcurrency.title: Min Concurrency
minConcurrency.description: Sets the minimum concurrency (parallelism) for the crawl. Shortcut to the corresponding AutoscaledPool option.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Sets the maximum concurrency (parallelism) for the crawl. Shortcut to the corresponding AutoscaledPool option.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Select proxies to be used by your crawler.
